# 题目

实现一个 `wrap_string` 函数，遍历给定字符串中的每个单词，如果当前行的长度超过了 `text_width::Int=10`，那么在末尾单词前插入换行符。提供给一个例子

```julia
function wrap_string(str::String, text_width::Int = 10)
    lines = Vector{String}()
    current_line = ""
    for word in split(str, ' ')
        if length(current_line) + length(word) >= text_width
            push!(lines, current_line)
            current_line = ""
        end
        current_line *= " $word"
    end
    push!(lines, current_line)  # 确保最后一个单词不被丢弃
    return join(lines, '\n')
end

# 示例：
julia> wrap_string("Hello this is a very long sentence that should be wrapped around.")
"Hello this is\na very long\nsentence that\nshould be\nwrapped around."
```
